```{r}
library(tidyverse)

expense <- read_csv("data/aoc_01.txt", col_names = "fee1")
```

```{r}
expense%>% 
  crossing(fee2 = expense$fee1) %>% 
  filter(fee1 + fee2 == 2020) %>% 
  mutate(product = fee1 * fee2)
```


```{r}
expense%>% 
  crossing(fee2 = expense$fee1) %>% 
  crossing(fee3 = expense$fee1) %>% 
  filter(fee1 + fee2 + fee3 == 2020) %>% 
  mutate(product = fee1 * fee2 * fee3)
```
